Sentece: After single-dosing at doses of 4, 8, and 12 mg, the mean area under the concentration-time curve from 0 to 36 h (AUC(0-36)) values were 136.82±46.38, 270.17±54.66, and 474.63±108.50 µg/l·h and the mean maximal silodosin concentration in plasma (C(max)) values were 26.70±7.48, 48.47±12.35, and 94.07±22.59 µg/l, respectively.
